name: Apprentice Siren
description:
Apprentice Siren - game

Dive into a rhythmic adventure as an apprentice siren. 

Your quest is to unlock new songs, evade enemies and sink ships by collecting voice orbs.

Rule the seas and challenge your friends to beat your score!

Art

Elizabet Halatyan, Tatu Uusitalo

Code

Laura Heikkinen, Turo Väärti

Music and SFX

Artlist.io

Game made as a school project.
